attributes.action: Stop the Nigel Farage Show on LBC.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is there live on LBC radio and shared daily on all social media. Nigel Farage has a massive advantage and opportunity to indoctrinate listeners unlike any other party leader. How can this be fair or even legal?
attributes.background: Never before have I known there to be a political situation like this. The Brexit Party exists and their leader seems to have access to the public like no other political party before. He is using this to his advantage every day preaching to his supporters.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for LBC and not the UK Government or Parliament.
